author: noonaut
content:
Hey everyone! I was trying to do some tests running kurtosis/ethereum-package with `electra_fork_epoch: 0` in the [lambda_consensus repo](https://github.com/lambdaclass/lambda_ethereum_consensus) and been having some issues with CLs stoping at launch (tested with various, Lighthouse/Lodestar/Teku/Besu). Moving to `electra_fork_epoch: 1` solves the issue but i wanted to try with an electra genesis. 

I'm testing a couple of things, like updating our fork of ethereum-package ([we are a couple of weeks behind main](https://github.com/lambdaclass/ethereum-package/compare/lecc-integration-electra...ethpandaops:ethereum-package:main), but wanted to ask here in the meantime because I saw this issue opened and thought it might be a known one: https://github.com/ethpandaops/ethereum-package/issues/911

BTW here is a kurtosis config with lighthouse:

```yaml
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: ethereum/client-go:v1.15.6
    cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: sigp/lighthouse:v7.0.0-beta.5
    count: 3
    validator_count: 32

additional_services:
  - tx_spammer
  - dora

network_params:
  electra_fork_epoch: 0
```

And the error:

